document_data.name: ''Medallion of Elemental Summoning''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Medallions of elemental summoning''''' were magical items that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: These magical items were golden medallions with a stone inset depending on the type of elemental it could summon: blue for water, brown for earth, red for fire, and clear for air.
document_data.Powers: Any type of person could use these medallions to control a powerful elemental for up to one month at a distance of up to half a mile (0.8 km). Detailed instructions needed to be given to the elemental. The medallions could not be used more than five times.
